item.title: More photos from Alabama: Cathedral Caverns, Autumn at Monte Sano, and pumpkins
item.description:
I’m finally getting around to sifting through some of the photos I’ve taken over the past couple of months and uploading them to Flickr. Here’s the one from the first batch taken at Cathedral Caverns in Scottsboro, AL:
And here are some shots I took of the Autumn trees from up on Monte Sano:
And a few shots of our pumpkins from Halloween:

item.title: Huntsville and such
item.description: Those of you who know me should know why I haven’t updated in a long time. Amanda and I had a very long month when we went down to Huntsville for Mike’s wedding. We had our baby Isaac prematurely, and after fighting for three long weeks in the Huntsville NICU, he passed away peacefully in our arms. We’re still having a hard time with it, but I suppose it’s good to talk about it.
